posts.post_content:
I am looking for 1911 Obak's to complete a set.  I am interested in ones I need and some upgrades.  Can be raw or graded by PSA or SGC.  My set can be seen at this site: [url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=427&userset=5655[/url]

Email: [url]joel.tschantz@savageandassociates.com[/url]  if you have any available...thank you in advance

Any interest in a BVG 5 Carlisle????

Frank
